about_the_game:
Claim 4 exclusive skins by finishing the new challenges added in this DLC and get access to the content of the Unlockable-Hats-Pack.

Skins & Quests-Pack:
King (Soldier-Skin): As a Soldier survive an invasion on king difficulty without losing doors/walls
Jester (Defender-Skin): As Defender kill 200 Goblins while laughing
Warnir (Mage-Skin): As Mage kill the Warnir on king difficulty and remain full HP the whole round
Fairy (Archer-Skin): As Archer prevent 20 Bombers from destroying the castle

Unlockable-Hats-Pack-Content
Haybale: Survive an Invasion on peasant difficulty without dying
Flowerpot: Survive an Invasion on citizen difficulty without dying
Little Companion: Survive an Invasion on knight difficulty without dying
Crown: Survive an Invasion on king difficulty without dying
15.000 Gold

Note: This DLC is not refundable because of the consumable Gold and the cosmetics (Skins & Hats) need to be unlocked by finishing the quest asociated with the cosmetic item
